Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Soviet Union Postage Stamp Album TAM.791
.25 Linear Feet in 1 half manuscript box.
1972-1976 This postage stamp album dates from 1972 to 1976, and contains stamps with images of the Soviet space program, indigenous animals, and political leaders. Materials in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
There is no documentation concerning the provenance of these materials. The accession number associated with this donation is 2019.031.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials within the album are arranged in the order in which they were received.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Soviet Union Postage Stamp Album; TAM 791; box number; folder number or item identifier; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
Material was placed in a new acid-free folder and box.
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of a postage stamp album from 1972 to 1976, and contains stamps with images of the Soviet space program, indigenous animals, and political leaders.
Conditions Governing Use
Tamiment Library has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Materials in this collection, which were created in 1972-1976 range, are expected to enter the public domain in 2092.
Postage stamps Soviet Union.
